description: Lists the log streams for the specified log group.

unverifiedMitreAttackTechniques.reason: Listing log streams can help identify different cloud accounts or services that are being logged.
Automating the listing of log streams is a part of setting up a system for automated data collection.
Log streams may include process logs that reveal information about running processes in the environment.
Log streams can help in identifying which users or systems are generating logs, aiding in system owner/user discovery.
By listing log streams, one can determine the existence of remote systems being logged.
Logs may contain information about system configurations, operating systems, and other details relevant for system information discovery.
Identifying log streams can help in discovering the usage of valid accounts, potentially indicating compromised or misused accounts.

securityImplications: Attackers might use DescribeLogStreams to discover CloudWatch log configurations.
